articles.author: Janay Kingsberry, Travis M. Andrews, Niha Masih
articles.title: Trump plans to close Kennedy Center for about two years, starting in July - The Washington Post
articles.description: Under a proposal by President Donald Trump, the closure could begin July 4, with construction beginning immediately.
articles.content:
Under the proposal, the Kennedy Center could close for construction on July 4, coinciding with Americas 250th anniversary.
Updated February 2, 2026 at 12:34 a.m. EST1 minute ago
